Author: iloveyouocean
Content: Who do you think will end up buying all the successful run-off companies?  Its much easier just to pick the winners than mess around with a ton of investments.

Author: jamesbritt
Content: Any idea (from anyone) on how easy it is to use while not looking at it?  Muscle memory, tactile feedback, sounds, mistake avoidance/forgiveness?

Author: nonrecursive
Content: Also, I recommend doing some basic testing for domain names.  Just buy the domain names you're considering, put an email signup or something on them (or have them redirect to a functioning site, whatever), then run identical ads for them and see which gets better click through.

Author: nonrecursive
Content:
My experience is that people are much more likely to remember .com . That's the default in people's brains, so if you end in .net or .org or .whatever , it's extra work for people to remember that.

For example, I've mentioned justin DOT tv to several people, and they still try to go to justintv.com .
